dads1.description:
Sunday brunch with friends.
Dads left to right: Jeremy, Dean, Steve
Kids left to right: Ezekiel, Sierra, Felix, Nathaniel
dads1.title: Dads 1

dads2.description: Jeremy, Ezekiel, Dean and Felix cuddle up.
dads2.title: Dads 2

dim_sum.description: Dim Sum lunch with Epicentric friends Miles and Amy.  This was Felix's first steamed pork bun (one of Dean's favorite foods).
dim_sum.title: Dim Sum

garden.description: Every morning, Lucie and Felix water the garden.
garden.title: Garden

just_browsing.description: Felix already succumbing to advertisements for male role models.
just_browsing.title: Just Browsing

out_there.description: Happy to be on the move.
out_there.title: Out There

palo_alto.description:
Day out in Palo Alto. Felix has outgrown all his boy sun hats, so we made do with the pink one. Here, he gets revenge for the fashion choice.

Felix is wearing 2 year old clothes (size 2T).
palo_alto.title: Palo Alto

sylvie.description:
The week before last, Felix started spending Tuesdays and Thursdays with nanny Sylvie, and another baby, Silas. He loves it. He gets in Sylvie's car and they drive away without him crying at all. He's not anxious to see Lucie in the evenings. Last Thursday it was a bit chilly out so they went to the SPCA to see the puppies, and a pet store to look at fish. Felix and Silas were mesmerized by the fish.

Last Thursday, the two boys were getting jealous of each other: they'd cry a bit when Sylvie picked the other up. We'll see how that plays out this week.
sylvie.title: Sylvie

walk1.description: Felix began walking!  He started Friday.  It's just 3 to 5 steps at a time, before he ends up in dad or mom's arms.  We haven't managed to get a shot of him walking unassisted:  when the camera comes out, he gets more interested in it than walking.
walk1.title: Walk 1

walk2.description: As of Friday, Felix is very serious and diligent about learning to walk.  He practices by going fast around the furniture and walls.
walk2.title: Walk 2

walk3.description: Felix has excellent vertical-to-horizontal control.  He crouches down in a slow, controlled fashion.
walk3.title: Walk 3

walk4.description: Felix is also pretty good pushing his stroller car, but we didn't get a shot of it, so Dean is standing in.  Use your imagination.
walk4.title: Walk 4

description:
We had a fun week. Felix has been in a great mood, learning all sorts of new things.

Notice the orange clothes in many of the pictures. For all you people in countries not fortunate enough to have this particular holiday, orange and black are the official Halloween colors. It's on October 31. Lucie is eagerly anticipating it: it's her favorite American holiday. She's been working for a while now on her costume. We're throwing a Halloween party next weekend.
title: October 20
